fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Data Protection, policy on Digital Economy, including Internet of Things, Cloud, Spectrum, Digital Single Market, STEM, Smart Cities, Smart Health, Smart Transport, IP protection, HPC, Horizon2020, ENISA, ETSI, AIOTI
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: CONNECT Advisory Forum for Research and Innovation in ICT in Horizon 2020#E02887#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2887#Member#C
membership: We are members of AIOTI. We are members of some UK business organisations too.
goals__remit: We design microprocessors and related products. We have a strong interest in mobile phone technology, IoT, AI, smart transport, health, servers/data centres etc
relevant_communication: We do not organise public policy events, but obviously try to attend them. We do not usually publish policy papers. We submit papers in response to consultations etc.
